NK001(ka)007:0: skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa'i brgyud 'debs bsdus pa byin rlabs dpal skyed ces bya ba dge /
NK001(ka)007:1: ston mchog sh+aakya seng+ge-spyan ras gzigs //
NK001(ka)007:2: pan chen bi ma dz+ny+aa na ku m+aa ra //
NK001(ka)007:3: so zur gnubs gsum kun mkhyen rong klong zung //
NK001(ka)007:4: gter bdag gling pa lo chen chos dpal nas //
NK001(ka)007:5: rtsa ba'i bla ma'i bar byon skyabs 'gro'i gzhung //
NK001(ka)007:6: yan lag drug pa'i chos kyi mnga' bdag la //
NK001(ka)007:7: gsol ba 'debs so thos bsam sgom sgrub kyis //
NK001(ka)007:8: rang rgyud smin grol 'chad rtsod rtsom pa yis //
NK001(ka)007:9: gzhan phan byed stobs thub bstan ji srid bar //
NK001(ka)007:10: 'dzam gling mdzes pa'i rgyan du 'phel rgyas shog /
NK001(ka)007:11: chos grwa chen po o rgyan smin grol gling du dpal gyi seng+ges gsol ba btab pa'o //
